name: Realistic Shooting
description:
This is the first season for a series of modules to come, to present the hunt in all its disciplines in the form of a simulator game, which is aimed at true hunters, enthusiasts and new.

Ballistics calculations are as close as possible to reality, movements and simulation will allow you to improve your performance in the actual hunt.

Modules and options are coming, so do not hesitate to contact us and encourage us and leave us a very positive evaluation if you liked our game.
